title: First stable basic version that works. List of changes:
message:
First stable basic version that works. List of changes:

- Changed CheckedTextView to TextView.
- Reduced list item text size.
- Removed no. of minimum lines for TextEdit in item entry activity.
- Removed Show Row ID's menu option and corresponding handling code.
- Commented out debug code.
- Added null check for activity result code to prevent crash.
- Added new class ChecklistItemAdapter that returns custom TextView for each list item.
- Added onStop() and onDestroy() functions in ItemDescriptionEntryActivity
- Added getItemStatus() function to ItemsDbHelper class. Retrieves checked/unchecked status of list item.
